text: vaastav mein, tumhaare lie un do dalon mein, jo (badr mein) sammukh ho gaye, ek nishaanee thee; ek allaah kee raah mein yudhd kar raha tha tatha doosara kaafir tha, ve (arthaat kaafir giroh ke log) apanee aankhon se dekh rahe the ki ye (musalamaan) to dugane lag rahe hain tatha allaah apanee sahaayata dvaara jise chaahe, samarthan deta hai. nihsandeh isamen samajh-boojh vaalon ke lie badee shiksha[1] hai
